Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, east of the Allisk Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The Allisk Circle is a moderate-sized traffic circle around which three roads intersect. Hillcrest Drive runs east and west. Lankshire Parkway runs north and south, and Appleton Road runs to the southeast. On the north side of the road you can see the dreaded Allisk Manor. On the south, you can see the western corner of the Circle-Bar Cattle Ranch.
